span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: APS offers at-home learning content to make it easy for our students to find the age-appropriate materials they need. We are also providing recommendations and access to books to read or borrow

a.title: HAC
a.span: Akron Public Schools uses an online system, eSchoolPlus Home Access Center (HAC), to provide a wealth of information for parents about their child(ren).

a.title: Enrolling Students
a.span: Families wishing to enroll new students into the district may do so online from home, at the school building or at the Engagement Center located at 10 N.Main Street during normal business hours

a.title: CCAA
a.span: College & Career Academies of Akron will transform the traditional high school experience into an innovative model that prepares all students for life, linking academic subjects to college majors and career sectors

img.alt: From the Desk of Karen Hazlett, Miller South

div.div: From the Desk of Karen Hazlett, Miller South
Students in Karen Hazlett's class at Miller South School for the Visual and Performing Arts created these "Pandemic Poems." We will publish one a day for the next few weeks.
